content: jackie s heart granny square this pattern is copyright © jackie tyler 1996-2021 do not post pattern on other web sites crochet groups etc or copy illegally it is free for personal use only square is 6 inches materials white and red worsted weight yarn i used red heart super savers hook 5mm or size needed to obtain a 6 inch square to make the heart chain 6 and join with slip_stitch round 1 working in ring single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet 2tr 2dc 3hdc single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet 3hdc 2dc 2tr double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet round 2 ch1 single_crochet in same st 2hdc in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 2 treble_crochet in next 2 st double_crochet in next 2 sts 2hdc in next st half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts 2tr in next 2st 2 double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet slip_stitch to join i have written the above out as plainly as i can right now be careful that you make sure you read st or sts now the granny round 1 with white and with wrong side of the heart facing you join with slip_stitch in a loop on round one just left of the hearts dip \/ here is a rear view pic which may help single_crochet in same st ch3 and single_crochet in a ring evenly around to make 8 loops slip_stitch to join every other chain loop will form a corner so try to get them evenly spaced so that the heart will be squarely placed when finished from now on ch3 in place of first double_crochet at beginning of all rounds round 2 slip_stitch to first loop *3dc ch1 3dc in loop 3dc in next loop* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join round 3 slip_stitch to ch1 space *3dc ch1 3dc in chain 1 space skip next 3 st 3dc in following space twice* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join round 4 slip_stitch to ch1 space *3dc ch1 3dc in chain 1 space skip next 3 st 3dc in following space 3 times* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join round 5 slip_stitch to ch1 space *3dc ch1 3dc in chain 1 space skip next 3 st 3dc in following space 4 times* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join finish off this pattern is copyrighted © jackie tyler 1996-2021
